mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS doorId, d.door_name AS doorName, f.id AS floorId, f.floor_name AS floorName, b.id AS buildingId, b.building_name AS buildingName, IF(d.door_type=1,1,0) AS defaultAuthorizedFlag FROM sp_station s INNER JOIN sp_user_station us ON us.station_id = s.id INNER JOIN sp_group_station gs ON gs.station_id = s.id INNER JOIN sp_group_door gd ON gd.group_id = gs.group_id INNER JOIN sp_door d ON d.id = gd.door_id INNER JOIN base_floor f ON f.id = d.floor_id INNER JOIN base_building b ON b.id = f.building_id INNER JOIN base_staff staff ON staff.EMPLOYNUM = us.work_no INNER JOIN tb_user u ON u.mobile = staff.MOBILE WHERE u.open_id = #{openId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY f.id,d.id

SELECT d.id AS doorId, d.door_name AS doorName, d.door_type AS doorType, r.read_no AS readerNo, dc.id AS doorControllerId FROM sp_station s INNER JOIN sp_user_station us ON us.station_id = s.id INNER JOIN sp_group_station gs ON gs.station_id = s.id INNER JOIN sp_group_door gd ON gd.group_id = gs.group_id INNER JOIN sp_door d ON d.id = gd.door_id INNER JOIN sp_door_readno r ON d.door_readno_id = r.id INNER JOIN sp_door_controller dc ON dc.id = r.controller_id INNER JOIN base_staff staff ON staff.EMPLOYNUM = us.work_no INNER JOIN tb_user u ON u.mobile = staff.MOBILE WHERE u.open_id = #{openId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id
